results.name: A binary m-sequence: expansion of reciprocal of x^3 + x^2 + 1 (mod 2), shifted by 2 initial 0's.
reference: S. W. Golomb, Shift-Register Sequences, Holden-Day, San Francisco, 1967.
H. D. Lueke, Korrelationssignale, Springer 1992, pp. 43-48.
F. J. MacWilliams and N. J. A. Sloane, The Theory of Error-Correcting Codes, Elsevier/North Holland, 1978, p. 408.
link: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,0,0,0,0,0,1).
mathematica: PadLeft[ Mod[ CoefficientList[ Series[1/(1 + x^2 + x^3), {x, 0, 102}], x], 2], 105] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_ *)
xref: Cf. A011655..A011751 for other binary m-sequences.
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
